ISSUE.TITLE: Upgrade tabler to v1.0.0
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Upgrade the installed version of [Tabler](https://github.com/tabler/tabler) to [v1.0.0](https://github.com/tabler/tabler/releases/tag/v1.0.0). ### Justification After 24 beta releases, Tabler v1.0 is now available. I'm tagging this for the v4.3 release of NetBox as there may be some subtle UI changes or problems. This will ensure we have ample time to test Tabler v1.0 before the release.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #17793: Introduce a REST API endpoint for tagged objects (#18679) * Closes #17793: Introduce a REST API endpoint for tagged objects * Add missing object_id filter to TaggedItemFilterSet

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #18623: Upgrade Tabler to v1.0 (#18624) * Upgrade Tabler to v1.0 * Fix navigation menu colors * Reduce table column heading font size
